channel.title: Tips and Tricks on That's it ! Code Snippets
channel.description: Recent content in Tips and Tricks on That's it ! Code Snippets

item.title: Python >> Tips and Tricks 4
item.description: This tutorial will show you the code examples that how to use enumerate, Enum, switch case/match case, base64, bytes, bytearray.

item.title: Python >> Tips and Tricks 3
item.description: This tutorial will show you the code example that how to use virtual environment, absolute import and relative import, get absolute path of file, use argparse module, use set(), use range, get all files in a folder.

item.title: Python >> Tips and Tricks 2
item.description: This tutorial will show you the code example that how to add elements to list, add element to dictionary, access element in list, access element in dictionary.

item.title: Python >> Tips and Tricks 1
item.description: This tutorial will show you the code example that how to split a string, import module, use class and object, reverse a list, use args and kwargs, use exception.

item.title: Playwright >> Tips and Tricks (1)
item.description: This tutorial will show you the code example that how to use Playwright to get all cookies, get all links in the page, get all links containing specific string/text, click buttons, click links, click all links in new tabs (click multiple elements), get all pages/tabs, get all attributes of element, customize click timeout, click element if it exists, click specific position, click and drag (drag and drop).
